A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A great movie which entertains a lot. It payed homage to the Originals and Sequels by a lot of parallels and establishing and exploring Luke as a ccharacter. Still\, Rian Johnson couldn't seem to resist adding the latest \"in-every-superhero-movie-found\" humor that took away some of the movie's original \"Star Wars feeling\" and pushed it more towards an usual blockbuster feeling.\nGood\, but not as good as \"The Empire Strikes Back\"\, though The Last Jedi had more than one shocking moment.
